message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $9500. This is a competitive price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I'm interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand that $7000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $8200. This is a fair price that I think reflects the value the product will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $7800. This is a fair price that I think reflects the value I'll get from the product, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle again.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $8000, which is the minimum I'm willing to go. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business. If you're willing to meet me at this price, we can finalize the deal.
